Package src.pkg_items

Class ItemList

java.lang.Object
src.pkg_items.ItemList
public class ItemList extends Object
Manages a collection of items. Allows adding, retrieving, and removing items. Also provides a method to list items based on context.
Author:
Pierre MATAR

      private HashMap<String,Item> aItemList

  • Constructor Details

    • ItemList

      public ItemList()
      Constructs an ItemList with an empty HashMap of items.

  • Method Details

    • addItem

      public void addItem(Item pItem)
      Adds an item to the collection.
      Parameters:
      pItem - The item to add to the collection.

    • getItem

      public Item getItem(String pItemName)
      Retrieves an item from the collection by its name.
      Parameters:
      pItemName - The name of the item to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The item if found; otherwise, null.

    • removeItem

      public void removeItem(String pItemName)
      Removes an item from the collection by its name.
      Parameters:
      pItemName - The name of the item to remove.

    • getAllItemString

      public String getAllItemString(Object pO)
      Returns a string representation of all items in the collection. Displays different formats based on the context.
      Parameters:
      pO - The context (Room or Player).
      Returns:
      A string listing all items or a message if none.
